content: Follow the path up, and you'll reach a Shrine at the Relief of the Fallen Loong, and above will be a pavilion where the boss waits.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Yellow Loong'.
The content is as follows:
Follow the path up, and you'll reach a Shrine at the Relief of the Fallen Loong, and above will be a pavilion where the boss waits.
